```typescriptreact
// Camera Tracker Component - gets camera position from Canvas context
function CameraTracker({ onCameraUpdate }: { onCameraUpdate: (pos: [number, number, number], rot: [number, number, number]) => void }) {
  useFrame(({ camera }) => {
    onCameraUpdate(
      [camera.position.x, camera.position.y, camera.position.z],
      [camera.rotation.x, camera.rotation.y, camera.rotation.z]
    );
  });

}
```

```typescript
// Camera Tracker Component - gets camera position from Canvas context
function CameraTracker({ onCameraUpdate }: { onCameraUpdate: (pos: [number, number, number], rot: [number, number, number]) => void }) {
  useFrame(({ camera }) => {
    onCameraUpdate(
      [camera.position.x, camera.position.y, camera.position.z],
      [camera.rotation.x, camera.rotation.y, camera.rotation.z]
    );
  });
  return null;
}
```
- **Purpose**: Real-time coordinate display for precise positioning

```typescript
function CameraTracker() {
  useFrame(({ camera }) => {
    if (setCameraPosition && setCameraRotation) {
      setCameraPosition([camera.position.x, camera.position.y, camera.position.z]);
      setCameraRotation([camera.rotation.x, camera.rotation.y, camera.rotation.z]);
    }
  });
  return null;
}
```
